content: Oh large tables with carved legs the key to
this project are these beads and these are about three quarters of an inch long
and I really like the decorative nature of these right and these are gonna be

just take some coffee stirrers I'm gonna glue four of them together and then I'll
just glue the legs on with some goop so I'll glue these together with PVA
glue four of them and then do some crossbars on the bottom of the legs on
so here they are finished and let's take a look at the construction it's just
four of those coffee stirrers glued together then I have the legs on the
bottom there and the crossbars going across so that's a two and a half inches
long by an inch wide so really cool and just paint it up with the wood acrylic
and you're good to go of course black bomb at first with flat
black spray paint and then playing it up with brown acrylics so really cool just
a super super easy way to make long tables with a nice decorative legs there
you go take care have fun hey everybody I'm glue being the glue gun I wasn't
